title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
fullTitle: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild (TV Series 2007–2020)
plot: Longtime zookeeper Jack Hanna hosts this Emmy-winning show that takes viewers on a journey around the world to showcase animals in their natural habitats. In addition to showing footage of the creatures and giving information about the places where they live, "Into the Wild" discusses the protection and conservation of endangered species. Among the locations visited are remote jungles, deserts, oceans and forests.
stars: Jack Hanna, Suzi Hanna, Kathleen Hanna
